channel.title: Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund
channel.description: Recent content in Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund

item.title: Atol Atol Atol, Mellie, Planets Are On It
item.description: Next income tax refund show this Friday (13th – sorry) at Gleiserei/end of Eisi. Doors: 19h00 人人人 Start: 20h15 Thanks to Lars Spasz for his „Design“ https://www.instagram.com/larsspaszdesigns/ ATOL ATOL ATOL (Wroclaw/Poland) [jagged, frantic p-punk] feat. members of Kurws, Ukryte Zalety Systemu and Przepych. Clean, cool basslines intermingling with alarm-sound synths, springy guitars and zesty vocals. It’s rhythmic, it’s repetitive and’s got some dense drum action with funky jam block ’n’ cowbell sprinkles going on, too.

item.title: Pogy & les Kefars, Parking Lot, Snitsh Pitsh
item.description: Pogy & les Kefars [Marseille, FR / Brussels, BE] Parking Lot [carport rock, Leipzig] +possibly Snitsh Pitsh from Leipzig (depends on how long we can go on a Tuesday night) Pogy & les Kefars Parking Lot Snitsh Pitsh
